Events

MicroAutomation will attend events throughout 2018 to allow us to stay at the forefront of the contact center and emergency operations industries, evaluate new products and technologies, and support community events. Our participation in industry and community activities allows us to bring optimal technology to you and ensure that our community continues to grow and prosper.

Current events include:

APCO 2019

By: MicroAutomation

APCO 2019 | August 11-14 | Baltimore Convention Center | Baltimore, MD

APCO 2019 is the premier event for public safety communications officials, from frontline telecommunications to comm center managers to public safety communications equipment and service vendors. Starting August 11, APCO 2019 offers four days of educational sessions, committee meetings and special events, paired with two full days of exhibits. MicroAutomation will be demoing our Next Generation 911 call handling solution, Omni911 at booth #471. Be sure to stop by!
